page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF......
page.content: My{Mother}is called Jennifer Dennis.She works for a{bakers}and {confectioners}firm called Spinks.They are based in Sharston, Manchester.Her alarm goes off about six fifteen a.m. She gets up at ten past seven a.m and then gets dressed.At about eight o'clock she sets out for work.She is a senior manageress and is in charge of six shops. She works in the shops which are losing money.Sometimes my mother has to serve even though it is not her job.The paperwork is normally done by the managress but when my Mother is there she would do it. At about a quarter to six she gets in and has a cup of coffee.She makes dinner at six thirty.We normally have something easy for her to make. She watches{television}until about quarter to eleven.
